summary: Build a complete live mock website (fully clickable demo) as the first priority; defer/remove PWA scope for now.
architectural_notes: Scope change: prioritize a fully clickable live website mock; PWA work is deferred/not in scope for the first release.

existing_features.title: Build the website frontend with a complete, responsive landing experience (header/nav, hero, feature sections, and footer) suitable for both desktop and mobile.
Add Progressive Web App (PWA) support so the website is installable and provides an app-like experience (web app manifest + service worker).
Implement an offline-friendly experience for the PWA with a clear offline fallback page/screen when the user opens the app without connectivity.
Add generated PWA icon assets to the project as static files and reference them from the manifest and HTML (favicon / apple-touch-icon where appropriate).
Choose and apply a coherent visual theme (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) and enforce it consistently across the site.
Remove/disable Progressive Web App (PWA) behavior so the deliverable is a standard website (no installability, no service worker caching, no offline fallback page experience).

Expand the current landing page into a fully clickable live mock website demo by implementing clickable navigation and call-to-action flows that lead to dedicated on-site sections/pages with real placeholder content (no dead links).
Update site branding and copy to be website-focused (remove 'Web PWA' naming and PWA-centric descriptions from visible UI and document metadata).

new_feature_requests.summary: Deliver a complete live mock website (fully clickable demo) as the initial focus (website first).
